document_data.name: Watchful Eye (Espar)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watchful Eye''' was the only inn in [[Espar]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Structure: The building's name came from the sign outside which showed the symbol for the god [[Helm]]. Inside, the establishment was simple and bland with no decorations or elaborate furniture.
document_data.Atmosphere: The inn was calm and efficient, and was not dissimilar in its atmosphere to an actual temple of Helm.
document_data.Inhabitants: Mostly farmers stayed at the Watchful Eye of Espar.
document_data.Services: Although not a restaurant, the inn served mediocre food in generous portions. It took pride in its superior stable service.
